titles.title: Expressing the profound regret and sorrow of the House of Representatives on the death of Richard Milhous Nixon, former President of the United States of America.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/25/1994--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of Richard Milhous Nixon, former President of the United States.
